misc: Runs his mouth all the time
Constantly sees birds and other wildlife on the course
Might stand on the ball for quite some time in the tee box
biography: Juuso, a Hyvinkään Golf icon, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée. Known for his talkative nature, Juuso has participated in 8 previous editions of the tournament, bringing his unique blend of skill and chatter to the competition.

While Juuso is still searching for his first Hector Trophée victory, his enthusiasm for the game remains undiminished. Opponents often remark on Juuso's keen eye for the wildlife on the course, as he is known to pause and appreciate the avian and other creatures that share the greens with him.

Spectators have also noted Juuso's meticulous approach to each tee shot, often taking his time to ensure the perfect stance, perhaps even standing on the ball for a prolonged period. While Juuso will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, his presence will surely be missed, though last-minute changes to the field are always possible.
